aircraft.value: Sparrow Light - AC-3432-936 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Priority valve malfunction. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 12/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 14/09/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 13/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 18/09/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 20/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
